page.title: 04MY PET
page.content: My pet is a goldfish and I have had it for 2 years and 7 months. I got it from Fishlake Water Gardens. I went with my next door neighbour so he could get some apple trees. There were millions of fish in big tubs. I went to the tub with goldfish in it and he asked me if I wanted one so I said yes. I chose my own so I got a polythene bag filled it with water and got a net and caught one and put it in the bag and then I went for a drink of cocoa cola and then I went home. I bought a goldfish bowl and some coloured stones. When I got home again I filled it with water and put the fish in it and as soon as I put it in it jumped out again so I poured some of the water out again and then I went to the shop for some fish food and fed it.
